attrs.name: start
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 9:00.

attrs.name: end
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 18:00.

attrs.name: step
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 00:30

attrs.name: minTime
attrs.desc: Minimum time. Time segments earlier than the minimum time will be disabled.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 00:00.

attrs.name: maxTime
attrs.desc: Maximum time. Time segments later than the maximum time are disabled.
